text: <@U00> uploaded a file: <https://prospelaautumn1.slack.com/files/U7DCG4BV1/F7SMDBXNC/20171101_094820.jpg|ChelseaFCFoundation.jpg> and commented: Meeting at the best football club today!!! (Met with Chelsea FC Foundation to talk edtech!)
What are you up to today? *Why not send a quick photo insight to your mentees?!* :camera_with_flash:

<@U00> commented on <@U00>’s file <https://prospelaautumn1.slack.com/files/U7DCG4BV1/F7SMDBXNC/20171101_094820.jpg|ChelseaFCFoundation.jpg>: Excellent! If only the men’s team was as good as the ladies team...
Note: When sending your pics, it's best to send your commentary separately as hasn't always been sending with the pic (a slack issue!)
